heading: TESTING
description: Looking for a fresh cut, vibrant colour, or a stunning new style? With over 16 years of experience, I offer a full range of hair services in a relaxed, home-based salon. Whether you're after a routine trim or a complete makeover, I’m dedicated to creating a look that suits your unique style and personality. My flexible hours make it easy to fit in a hair appointment around your busy schedule, so you can leave feeling refreshed and confident.

Extra Information.name: Skin test is required at least 48 hours prior to any colour appointment.
